cyberInputMappingInfo:
</br>3. Cyber Input Variable Mapping Information:</br>
(1) size is mapped to the variable named Elasticity_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(2) When the value of Elasticity_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated size.</br>

(3) position is mapped to the variable named Friction_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(4) When the value of Friction_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated position.</br>
